00029 const MeCab::Option long_options[] = {
00030   { "rcfile",        'r',  0, "FILE",    "use FILE as resource file" },
00031   { "dicdir",        'd',  0, "DIR",    "set DIR  as a system dicdir" },
00032   { "userdic",        'u',  0, "FILE",    "use FILE as a user dictionary" },
00033   { "lattice-level",      'l', "0", "INT",
00034     "lattice information level (default 0)" },
00035   { "dictionary-info",  'D', 0, 0, "show dictionary information and exit" },
00036   { "all-morphs",      'a', 0, 0,    "output all morphs(default false)" },
00037   { "output-format-type", 'O',  0, "TYPE",
00038     "set output format type (wakati,none,...)" },
00039   { "partial",            'p',  0, 0,      "partial parsing mode" },
00040   { "node-format",        'F',  "%m\\t%H\\n", "STR",
00041     "use STR as the user-defined node format" },
00042   { "unk-format",        'U',  "%m\\t%H\\n", "STR",
00043     "use STR as the user-defined unknown node format"   },
00044   { "bos-format",        'B',  "", "STR",
00045     "use STR as the user-defined beginning-of-sentence format"   },
00046   { "eos-format",        'E',  "EOS\\n", "STR",
00047     "use STR as the user-defined end-of-sentence format"   },
00048   { "eon-format",        'S',  "", "STR",
00049     "use STR as the user-defined end-of-NBest format"   },
00050   { "unk-feature",       'x',  0, "STR",
00051     "use STR as the feature for unknown word" },
00052   { "input-buffer-size",  'b',  0, "INT",
00053     "set input buffer size (default 8192)" },
00054   { "dump-config", 'P', 0, 0, "dump MeCab parameters" },
00055   { "open-mutable-dictionary", 'M', 0, 0,
00056     "open dictioanry with mutable mode (experimental)" },
00057   { "allocate-sentence",  'C', 0, 0,
00058     "allocate new memory for input sentence" },
00059   { "nbest",        'N', "1",    "INT",
00060     "output N best results (default 1)" },
00061   { "theta",        't',  "0.75",  "FLOAT",
00062     "set temparature parameter theta (default 0.75)"  },
00063   { "cost-factor",        'c',  "700",  "INT",
00064     "set cost factor (default 700)"  },
00065   { "output",        'o',  0,    "FILE",  "set the output file name" },
00066   { "version",        'v',  0, 0,     "show the version and exit." },
00067   { "help",          'h',  0, 0,     "show this help and exit." },
00068   { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00069 };

00087   bool                  open(int, char**);

00129 bool TaggerImpl::open(int argc, char **argv) {
00130   Param param;
00131   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) << param.what();
00132   return open(&param);
00133 }

00135 bool TaggerImpl::open(const char *arg) {
00136   Param param;
00137   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(param.open(arg, long_options)) << param.what();
00138   return open(&param);

00140 
00141 bool TaggerImpl::open(Param *param) {
00142   close();
00143 
00144   if (param->get<bool>("help")) {
00145     WHAT << param->help();
00146     close();
00147     return false;
00148   }
00149 
00150   if (param->get<bool>("version")) {
00151     WHAT << param->version();
00152     close();
00153     return false;
00154   }
00155 
00156   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(load_dictionary_resource(param)) << param->what();
00157 
00158   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(tokenizer_.open(*param)) << tokenizer_.what();
00159   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(connector_.open(*param)) << connector_.what();
00160   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(viterbi_.open(*param, &tokenizer_, &connector_))
00161       << viterbi_.what();
00162   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(writer_.open(*param)) << writer_.what();
00163 
00164   if (param->get<std::string>("output-format-type") == "dump") {
00165     set_lattice_level(3);
00166     set_all_morphs(true);
00167   }
00168 
00169 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00170   std::locale::global(std::locale("C"));
00171 #endif
00172 
00173   return true;
00174 }

00210 const char *TaggerImpl::parse(const char *str) {
00211   return parse(str, std::strlen(str));
00212 }
00213 
00214 const char *TaggerImpl::parse(const char *str, size_t len) {
00215   const Node *n = parseToNode(str, len);
00216   if (!n) return 0;
00217   ostrs_.clear();
00218   CHECK_0(writer_.write(&ostrs_, str, n)) << writer_.what();
00219   ostrs_ << '\0';
00220   return ostrs_.str();
00221 }
00222 
00223 const char *TaggerImpl::parse(const char *str, size_t len,
00224                               char *out, size_t len2) {
00225   const Node *n = parseToNode(str, len);
00226   if (!n) return 0;
00227   StringBuffer os(out, len2);
00228   CHECK_0(writer_.write(&os, str, n)) << writer_.what();
00229   os << '\0';
00230   CHECK_0(os.str()) << "output buffer overflow";
00231   return os.str();
00232 }
00233 
00234 const char* TaggerImpl::formatNode(const Node* node) {
00235   ostrs_.clear();
00236   CHECK_0(writer_.writeNode(&ostrs_,
00237                             static_cast<const char *>(begin_), node))
00238       <<  writer_.what();
00239   ostrs_ << '\0';
00240   return ostrs_.str();
00241 }
00242 
00243 const char* TaggerImpl::formatNode(const Node* node,
00244                                    char *out, size_t len) {
00245   StringBuffer os(out, len);
00246   CHECK_0(writer_.writeNode(&os,
00247                             static_cast<const char *>(begin_), node))
00248       <<  writer_.what();
00249   os << '\0';
00250   CHECK_0(os.str()) << "output buffer overflow";
00251   return os.str();
00252 }

00254 const Node *TaggerImpl::parseToNode(const char *str) {
00255   return parseToNode(str, std::strlen(str));
00256 }
00257 
00258 const Node *TaggerImpl::parseToNode(const char *str, size_t len) {
00259   CHECK_RETURN(str, static_cast<Node *>(0)) << "NULL pointer is given";
00260   const Node *bosNode = viterbi_.analyze(str, len);
00261   CHECK_RETURN(bosNode, static_cast<const Node *>(0)) << viterbi_.what();
00262   return bosNode;
00263 }
00264 
00265 bool TaggerImpl::parseNBestInit(const char *str) {
00266   return parseNBestInit(str, std::strlen(str));
00267 }
00268 
00269 bool TaggerImpl::parseNBestInit(const char *str, size_t len) {
00270   CHECK_FALSE(viterbi_.lattice_level() >= 1) <<
00271       "use -l option to obtain N-Best results"
00272       ". e.g., mecab -N10 -l1";
00273   const Node *n = parseToNode(str, len);
00274   begin_ = str;
00275   if (!n) return false;
00276   if (!nbest_.get()) nbest_.reset(new NBestGenerator);
00277   nbest_->set(const_cast<Node *>(n));
00278   return true;
00279 }
00280 
00281 const Node* TaggerImpl::nextNode() {
00282   if (!nbest_.get()) nbest_.reset(new NBestGenerator);
00283   const Node *n = nbest_->next();
00284   CHECK_RETURN(n, static_cast<const Node*>(0)) << "no more results";
00285   score = n ? nbest_->nextScore() : 0;
00286   return n;
00287 }
00288 
00289 long TaggerImpl::nextScore(){
00290         return score;
00291 }
00292 
00293 const char* TaggerImpl::next() {
00294   const Node *n = nextNode();
00295 
00296   if (!n) return 0;
00297   ostrs_.clear();
00298   CHECK_0(writer_.write(&ostrs_,
00299                         static_cast<const char *>(begin_), n))
00300       << writer_.what();
00301   ostrs_ << '\0';
00302   return ostrs_.str();
00303 }
00304 
00305 const char* TaggerImpl::next(char *out, size_t len2) {
00306   const Node *n = nextNode();
00307   if (!n) return 0;
00308   StringBuffer os(out, len2);
00309   CHECK_0(writer_.write(&os,
00310                         static_cast<const char *>(begin_), n))
00311       << writer_.what();
00312   os << '\0';
00313   CHECK_0(os.str()) << "output buffer overflow";
00314   return os.str();
00315 }

00317 const char* TaggerImpl::parseNBest(size_t N, const char* str) {
00318   return parseNBest(N, str, std::strlen(str));
00319 }
00320 
00321 const char* TaggerImpl::parseNBest(size_t N,
00322                                    const char* str, size_t len) {
00323   if (N == 1) return parse(str, len);
00324 
00325   if (!parseNBestInit(str, len)) return 0;
00326   ostrs_.clear();
00327 
00328   for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00329     const Node *n = nextNode();
00330     if (!n) break;
00331     CHECK_0(writer_.write(&ostrs_, str, n)) << writer_.what();
00332   }
00333 
00334   // make a dummy node for EON
00335   Node eon_node;
00336   memset(&eon_node, 0, sizeof(eon_node));
00337   eon_node.stat = MECAB_EON_NODE;
00338   eon_node.next = 0;
00339   eon_node.surface = "";
00340   writer_.writeNode(&ostrs_, str, &eon_node);
00341 
00342   ostrs_ << '\0';
00343   return ostrs_.str();
00344 }
00345 
00346 const DictionaryInfo *TaggerImpl::dictionary_info() const {
00347   return tokenizer_.dictionary_info();
00348 }
00349 
00350 const char* TaggerImpl::parseNBest(size_t N, const char* str, size_t len,
00351                                    char *out, size_t len2) {
00352   if (N == 1) return parse(str, len, out, len2);
00353 
00354   if (!parseNBestInit(str, len)) return 0;
00355   StringBuffer os(out, len2);
00356 
00357   for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00358     const Node *n = nextNode();
00359     if (!n) break;
00360     CHECK_0(writer_.write(&os, str, n)) << writer_.what();
00361   }
00362   os << '\0';
00363   CHECK_0(os.str()) << "output buffer overflow";
00364   return os.str();
00365 }

00378 
00379 Tagger *createTagger(int argc, char **argv) {
00380   TaggerImpl *tagger = new TaggerImpl();
00381   if (!tagger->open(argc, argv)) {
00382     setGlobalError(tagger->what());
00383     delete tagger;
00384     return 0;
00385   }
00386   return tagger;
00387 }
00388 
00389 Tagger *createTagger(const char *argv) {
00390   TaggerImpl *tagger = new TaggerImpl();
00391   if (!tagger->open(argv)) {
00392     setGlobalError(tagger->what());
00393     delete tagger;
00394     return 0;
00395   }
00396   return tagger;
00397 }

00399 const char *getTaggerError() {

00404 int mecab_do(int argc, char **argv) {
00405 #define WHAT_ERROR(msg) do {                    \
00406     std::cout << msg << std::endl;              \
00407     return EXIT_FAILURE; }                      \
00408   while (0);
00409 
00410   MeCab::TaggerImpl tagger;
00411   MeCab::Param param;
00412 
00413   if (!param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) {
00414     std::cout << param.what() << std::endl;
00415     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00416   }
00417 
00418   std::string ofilename = param.get<std::string>("output");
00419   if (ofilename.empty()) ofilename = "-";
00420 
00421   const int nbest = param.get<int>("nbest");
00422   if (nbest <= 0 || nbest > NBEST_MAX)
00423     WHAT_ERROR("invalid N value");
00424 
00425   if (nbest >= 2)
00426     param.set("lattice-level", 1, true);
00427 
00428   if (!tagger.open(&param)) {
00429     std::cout << tagger.what() << std::endl;
00430     std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00431   }
00432 
00433   MeCab::ostream_wrapper ofs(ofilename.c_str());
00434   if (!*ofs)
00435     WHAT_ERROR("no such file or directory: " << ofilename);
00436 
00437   if (param.get<bool>("dump-config")) {
00438     param.dump_config(&*ofs);
00439     return EXIT_FAILURE;
00440   }
00441 
00442   if (param.get<bool>("dictionary-info")) {
00443     for (const MeCab::DictionaryInfo *d = tagger.dictionary_info();
00444          d; d = d->next) {
00445       *ofs << "filename:\t" << d->filename << std::endl;
00446       *ofs << "version:\t" << d->version << std::endl;
00447       *ofs << "charset:\t" << d->charset << std::endl;
00448       *ofs << "type:\t" << d->type   << std::endl;
00449       *ofs << "size:\t" << d->size << std::endl;
00450       *ofs << "left size:\t" << d->lsize << std::endl;
00451       *ofs << "right size:\t" << d->rsize << std::endl;
00452       *ofs << std::endl;
00453     }
00454     return EXIT_FAILURE;
00455   }
00456 
00457   const std::vector<std::string>& rest_ = param.rest_args();
00458   std::vector<std::string> rest = rest_;
00459 
00460   if (rest.empty()) rest.push_back("-");
00461 
00462   size_t ibufsize = MeCab::_min(MAX_INPUT_BUFFER_SIZE,
00463                                 MeCab::_max(param.get<int>
00464                                             ("input-buffer-size"),
00465                                             MIN_INPUT_BUFFER_SIZE));
00466 
00467   bool partial = param.get<bool>("partial");
00468   if (partial) ibufsize *= 8;
00469 
00470   MeCab::scoped_array<char> ibuf_(new char[ibufsize]);
00471   char *ibuf =ibuf_.get();
00472 
00473   for (size_t i = 0; i < rest.size(); ++i) {
00474     MeCab::istream_wrapper ifs(rest[i].c_str());
00475     if (!*ifs) WHAT_ERROR("no such file or directory: " << rest[i]);
00476 
00477     while (true) {
00478       if (!partial) {
00479         ifs->getline(ibuf, ibufsize);
00480       } else {
00481         std::string sentence;
00482         char line[BUF_SIZE];
00483         for (;;) {
00484           if (!ifs->getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00485             ifs->clear(std::ios::eofbit|std::ios::badbit);
00486             break;
00487           }
00488           sentence += line;
00489           sentence += '\n';
00490           if (std::strcmp(line, "EOS") == 0 || line[0] == '\0')
00491             break;
00492         }
00493         std::strncpy(ibuf, sentence.c_str(), ibufsize);
00494       }
00495       if (ifs->eof() && !ibuf[0]) return false;
00496       if (ifs->fail()) {
00497         std::cerr << "input-buffer overflow. "
00498                   << "The line is splitted. use -b #SIZE option." << std::endl;
00499         ifs->clear();
00500       }
00501       const char *r = (nbest >= 2) ? tagger.parseNBest(nbest, ibuf) :
00502           tagger.parse(ibuf);
00503       if (!r)  WHAT_ERROR(tagger.what());
00504       *ofs << r << std::flush;
00505     }
00506   }
00507 
00508   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00509 
00510 #undef WHAT_ERROR
00511 }
